metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation STDIN+ Launcher - System
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(metadata.log_provider) = lower('service control manager') AND metadata.event_code = 7045 AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('cmd')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('powershell')) AND (contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('/c')) OR contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('/r'))) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('noexit')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('input')) AND contains(lower(process.file.path), lower('$')))

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated use of stdin to execute PowerShell
